body_html: hi, the version is 0.4.1. DistributedDataParallel has some issues especially in official imagenet examples. After some modification, I can successfully run imagenet cross-node. However it shows segmentation fault after the 1sy epoch. Hopefully 1.0 will not have this issue. Let me try it out.

However it shows segmentation fault after the 1sy epoch.  Hopefully 1.0 will not have this issue.  Let me try it out.
body: hi, the version is 0.4.1.  DistributedDataParallel has some issues especially in official imagenet examples.  After some modification, I can successfully run imagenet cross-node.  However it shows segmentation fault after the 1sy epoch.  Hopefully 1.0 will not have this issue.  Let me try it out.
